name: Second Person: Secret Laboratory (itch)
description:
Experiments. What could be better? - Horror from the second person. Controlling a monster created in a secret laboratory, he achieved his goal until she hid from you.

What is being developed here? For what? - the main questions of the game. One of the projects needs strength for development and all laboratory workers have only two options:
- an organized struggle with your most successful creation;
- a terrible death.
It only depends on you.

Add to Wishlist   https://store.steampowered.com/app/1416220/Second_Person_Secret_Laboratory/
